page.title: 18VILLAGE FETES
page.content: On the first Saturday of July every year is held Cambo Village Fete to gather funds for running the Village Hall.Stalls are set out on the green. Teas are served in the village hall. There is a Fancy Dress parade ,Sports and a Fell Race.There is a children's painting competition and a photograph competition.A well known figure opens the Fete.It is well attended by locals and visitors. The other annual village event is the November 5th.Fireworks gathering followed by children's games in the Village Hall.
